attributes.action: Legalise child parking spaces, and give them the same value as disabled parking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When you apply for a maternity card or your Government grant money you should also have to apply for a child parking permit that is valid until each child is seven. If then this is not displayed in your vehical when parking in these bays you should receive a ticket up to the value of £30. This parking permit is only to be used to park in these child bays. It is unfair the amount of people who park in these spaces, provided for families, that dont have children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
